When this website was first created in April, 1997, it was meant more for our members' benefit than for anyone else's.

            However, it's a New Year ...
                We have a "new" Realm ...
                    and the M&Ms want to grow!

    To do this, we feel we should have something viable for All Realm Players to see; something that will let others learn more about our guild and something which can benefit our members as well. Thus our "new" and, hopefully, improved website is born.


    The Guild -- This section includes the philosophy and history of the M&Ms (and I don't mean the candy).

    Members -- Included here is not only a complete listing of all our members, but their type of character (warrior, wizard, etc), alignment (saintly, good, etc), times most likely to be found in The Realm, and a few other items of interest.

    Events -- This will include any and all activities that the M&Ms plan to be involved in as a group or individually.

    Links -- Most of the links here will be of our members and other guilds with whom we've exchanged links.

    Classified Ads -- Offerings of services from our members will be listed here. Such things as officiating at weddings, enchantments, sales or trades of special items, tour guides, and so forth.

    Apply For Membership -- How to apply for membership into The M&M Guild.

    Guild Jobs -- This is a listing of all our chair-people and the activities their various "committees" are engaged in.

    Pictures -- Our photograph album.

    Realm News -- Here you will find announcements about The Realm or The Guild or whatever might not neatly fit into any other category.

    Mailings -- This is a current Master Mailing list of email addresses of our members. Note: this is password protected to insure privacy.



    A Warm Welcome All Visitors

    We hope you'll drop by often to see what activities we are planning

    Before you venture onward,
    please sign our guest book.

    And many thanks for stopping by
